name: Contagion (itch)
description:
Created for the RPGmaker jam # 3 in two days on the theme on Contagion.

Contagion is a stream of consciousness horror game about trying to escape a locked room. 

The game is complete.  There are three core endings, each can have a subtle modification. Meaning there' actually 6 endings, but difference is subtle for three of them.

Tiles: Vexed Engima - POP Horror and Slasher Tiles

Song - Bruce Taylor is Watching - Crash Overture
It's 3am. I'll write a devlog in the morning
